dict.acceptation: 直率地（说），坦诚地；真诚地；坦白地；平心而论；

sent.orig: This controller still says frankly, sen Lan still will march all one's strength Beijing energy-saving market.
sent.trans: 这位负责人还坦言，森兰还将全力进军北京节能市场。

sent.orig: I've heard you play random, and frankly, so do I. Ever wished you didnt?
sent.trans: 我听说你搞的是随机，坦白的说，我他妈的也是。你想没想过不用随机？

sent.orig: Love Match Series "-Frankly unveils the secret of love. "
sent.trans: 1996年[找到他系列]以最坦白的笔触揭开爱情之谜。

sent.orig: To speak frankly, it doesn't depend on me.
sent.trans: 坦白地说，这不取决于我。

sent.orig: He received me not very frankly, looked me all over, and turned to his work again.
sent.trans: 他见了我很不自然，把我全身看了一遍之后，又转身去工作了。
